statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, points FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT rewards FROM loyalty_program WHERE points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, engagement_level FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE engagement_level='high';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, points FROM loyalty_program WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, rewards FROM loyalty_program WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE points BETWEEN 50 AND 150 AND engagement_level = 'Medium';
SELECT customer_id, points, rewards FROM loyalty_program WHERE points < 50 OR engagement_level = 'Low';
SELECT * FROM customer_points WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, points FROM customer_points WHERE points > 100;
SELECT reward_name, description FROM rewards WHERE points_required < 500 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_points WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, points FROM customer_points WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_points WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM customer_points GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_points > 500
SELECT customer_id, reward_name, points_required FROM customer_points INNER JOIN rewards ON customer_points.points >= rewards.points_required
SELECT id, reward_name, description FROM rewards WHERE points_required < 200 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(id) AS total_transactions FROM customer_points GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_transactions > 3
SELECT customer_name, points FROM customers WHERE points > 100
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5
SELECT reward_name FROM rewards WHERE points_required <= 50
SELECT customer_name, points FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, last_interaction FROM engagement ORDER BY last_interaction DESC
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, points ASC;
SELECT customer_name, points FROM customers WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, r.reward_name FROM customers c JOIN rewards r ON c.points >= r.points_required;
SELECT c.customer_name, e.engagement_level, e.last_interaction FROM customers c LEFT JOIN engagement e ON c.customer_id = e.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE points_required > (SELECT AVG(points) FROM customers);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, points FROM customers ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards WHERE points_required < 500;
SELECT customers.customer_name, rewards.reward_name FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.points = rewards.points_required;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, points FROM customers ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, reward_name, points_required FROM customers INNER JOIN rewards ON customers.points >= rewards.points_required;
SELECT customer_name, engagement_level FROM customers INNER JOIN engagement ON customers.customer_id = engagement.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, points FROM customers ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE points > 100;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE points_earned > points_spent ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, points FROM customers JOIN engagement ON customers.customer_id = engagement.customer_id WHERE engagement_level = 'high';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, points FROM customers WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY points ASC;
SELECT customer_name, engagement_level FROM customers c JOIN engagement e ON c.customer_id = e.customer_id WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT customer_name, rewards.reward_name FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id JOIN rewards ON t.points_earned >= points_required;
SELECT customer_name, activity_description FROM customers c JOIN activity_log a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
